alert.note: Alert for Berks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:51PM EST until December 19 at 2:30AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Schuylkill River At Reading affecting Berks County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding remains possible downstream of Reading on the Schuylkill River. While the Reading gauge has fallen below flood stage, Pottstown remains at 13.85 feet, with flood stage being 12.50 feet. * WHERE...Schuylkill River at Reading. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.6 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 15.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Stg Time Date Schuylkill River Reading 15.5 13.4 Mon 10 p 8.4 7.2 MSG unknown &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 230 AM EST.
